mapper.select: select category_code, (select category_name from category C where C.category_code = B.category_code) as category_name , count(category_code) as catCnt from board B group by CATEGORY_CODE union select '00' as category_code, '전체' as category_name, count(category_code) as catCnt from board B order by category_code asc;
mapper.insert: insert into board (category_code, title, content, image1, image2, image3, image4, image5, image6, price, user_id, user_seq, wdate) values (#{category_code}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{image4}, #{image5}, #{image6}, #{price}, #{user_id}, #{user_seq}, now())
mapper.select: select board_seq ,(select category_name from category C where C.category_code = B.category_code) as category_name ,category_code ,title ,content ,image1 ,image2 ,image3 ,image4 ,image5 ,image6 ,price ,(select user_id from member M where M.userid = B.user_id) as user_id ,(select nick_name from member M where M.userid = B.user_id) as nick_name ,(select address1 from member M where M.userid = B.user_id) as address1 ,(select sum(zzim) from zzim Z where Z.board_seq=B.board_seq) as zzim_cnt ,(select count(*) from board B where B.user_seq = (select user_seq from board where board_seq = #{board_seq})) as my_cnt ,hit ,(select images from member M where M.userid = B.user_id) as user_images from board B where board_seq=#{board_seq}
mapper.update: update board set category_code = #{category_code}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, image3 = #{image3}, image4 = #{image4}, image5 = #{image5}, image6 = #{image6}, price = #{price}, user_id = #{user_id}, user_seq = #{user_seq} where board_seq = #{board_seq}
